title: Display face, sans serif, post modern
content:
This is a screen grab I took a while ago from a youtube video featuring the @willdabeast\_\_ dance crew in LA. He has a number of folks produce his videos and this typography jumped out at me. Anyone know the font and the foundry? Thank you in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415024741im_/http:/typophile.com/files/realtighteyez_5029.png)
author: chrisdigital
